---
name: Security disclosure
about: Report a security vulnerability or sensitive issue.
title: "Security Disclosure: "
labels: security
assignees: ''
---

If you've found a security vulnerability or a way to access sensitive data, thank you for responsibly disclosing it.

Please provide the following information:

- Your name and contact email:
- Affected component(s): (backend, frontend, infra, etc.)
- Steps to reproduce:
- Potential impact:
- Any suggested mitigations:

If you prefer, you can email security@example.com instead of opening an issue. Please don't include sensitive data in a public issue; use the email option for secrets or PII.
